1.text: Pour about 2 cups (470 mL) of orange juice in a plastic bag.

2.text: Place the bag inside of another plastic bag.

3.text: Fill the second, gallon-sized bag up with ice.

4.text: Shake a hefty amount of salt into the bag.

5.text: Seal up the second bag and make sure it’s airtight.

6.text: Wrap the bags in a towel.

7.text: Shake the bags for about 10 minutes.

8.text: Pour your orange juice slushie into a cup and drink up.
